place_name: Knowledge Perk Coffee Company | Fort Mill
place_description: Rock Hill, South Carolina's original hometown coffee roaster! Come relax in our beautiful café with indoor and outdoor seating. We offer freshly roasted coffee, cold brew, full range of expert espresso beverages (both hot and iced), and a variety of sweet and savory pastry options. All coffee is roasted in house and is available onsite or via our website for retail purchase. We have immersive, engaging programs and events for our community to grow in their knowledge and enjoyment of coffee. Give us a call or visit our website for more information. Better yet, drop by to see us in person!

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee. Great staff. Know me by name and by order.
The coffee is great and they have incredibly comfortable chairs. Great place to hang out and get some work done.

I live next to this place and wanted so badly to like it, but they didn't have vanilla, they didn't have oat-milk (two starter pack ingredients for a coffee shop) and they forgot to make my bagel sandwich until my husband went to ask about it 10 minutes later.

I purchased a tea which was $3.21 for a small. Which is a bit pricey I can get a whole box of tea for close to that price. . I'm not a cheapskate and I don't mind shelling out money for things I like but Dunkin Dounuts is half the price same size.  Also when I looked inside the tea it was not in a tea bag it was tea loose. This is not safe if your giving tea to a kids or the elderly they can digest the loose tea particles and choke..  I think customers should be warned of this type of brewing process.
The diced bagel sandwiches are incredible!

I like this place for a couple of reasons. They use different beans from all over the world. They have heavy cream as an option, where most only have half & half. They have real dishes, not just Togo cups. The place feels like a coffee shop, students studying, people working on their laptops, and the staff always seem happy, even when they aren't dealing with customers.

This is the only place where they get the flat white right every single time, no matter who the barista is. Finding such consistent, great service is incredibly rare. It also offers a wonderful atmosphere for focusing."
great place to get work done aswell as great coffee!
First timer. The latte was pretty watery :(
Incredibly tasty coffee and espresso drinks, coupled with great service and a convenient location
This is my favorite local place for a coffee. They now have bagels!  Try the breakfast scramble!

So I'm not much of a coffee drinker, but the people and the atmosphere are amazing to be in. They open up their business to everyone and are very inviting and love their community. They allow us to host a men's fellowship every Monday morning at 7:00. We are blessed to have this business in our community. I definitely recommend
Blueberry muffin was fresh & delicious.  The coffee was freshly brewed. Great place, but pricy.
Excellent coffee, tea, and service! The snacks and treats are also delicious.

Not bad. Brewed coffee is okay. The espresso drinks are hit and miss. Lately they've been hitting properly, but the first few visits. I suspect it's training related.

They have food there, but it sells out early. I only stop in around lunch and the shelves are barren by 11
Came in two days in a row. Coffee is super yummy! Also enjoyed dining in and the snacking pastries.
Nice place and atmosphere

A DELICIOUS Lavender Latte in a MUG ,, ( holding a warm mug makes ALL the difference!) with a beautiful design ,, by an exceptional barista with some of my favorite people ..


P.s. to the management ... window blinds ( or a creative cover ? ) at the entrance facing 160 would make the corner with the couch super cozy

KP has the best coffee in town! Their seasonal drink menu doesn't disappoint. The baristas are super friendly. Also, Mexico Villareal whole coffee beans FOR LIFE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Seriously good stuff!

I visit occasionally to catch up with a friend. We like their coffee and it's a relatively quiet place. You get a lot of street traffic noise if you sit outside. Inside is better obviously, to avoid that.

No matter what coffee you get they are usually right on the money. Also they roast their own beans at their Rock Hill location.

They have a limited amount of snacks in display case by the register and only occasionally have I ever see something that might be gluten free. So if that's you thing plan on the possibility of not having something to eat.

The furniture is ok for the most part. But the center island of stools are, to me anyway, awkward and very uncomfortable. But to be fair these are a leftover from the prior business that was there.

Stop by and have a cup, all in all it's a solid choice.
Amazing place, love the spinach feta with my coffee. #TYG #lifeisgood

Amazing coffee! It was my first time coming in, I was visiting from out of town. Customer service was remarkable. The two workers were extremely kind, attentive, and had a great coffee knowledge 10/10.
Coffee was delicious. I really enjoyed my pour over, as well as my cortado. All around extremely consistent and tasty.
Loved the vibe of the store. Plenty of space to sit and do some work.
Will definitely be back when I'm in town next!
Really good coffee.  Cinnamon buns were really good.
Amazing local coffee place! Great atmosphere and great service!!
The flat white was wonderful. Very relaxing and chill environment
Beautiful place with more perfect coffee!!
Good coffee shop. The vibe here is perfect for getting some work done. Coffee is solid and the space is plentiful. I like coming by here when I am around. Give it a try!
Awesome gingerbread latte
Great coffee shop
Spectacular food and service. Ordered breakfast and was delicious. Ciarra was awesome.
Did not have the advertised food.

First time experience. I showed up around 9am and ordered a Toffee Crunch latte. The baristas were friendly and my drink was made quickly. I brought my laptop as I had planned to stay and work. The shop was packed however, and the music was loud which isn't conducive for working. The middle bar/island seating barstools are weird. They swing in/out and it's very easy to lose your balance and slip as I did along with 2 other women who were sitting down across from me at the same time. The latte was underwhelming and was missing the rich espresso flavor I like. It tasted more like watered down coffee with flavored syrup and foam. I'm gonna stick to the Starbucks rivers and lakes I'm used to.
Loved it
Pretty cool place. Nice atmosphere too
Excellent service and coffee!!
Great cinnamon rolls and cold brews.
The coffee is so good, the barista is amazing and the breakfast empanada's are my favorite thing in the whole world. My husband and I love this place!
Excellent coffee and atmosphere to enjoy your drink. Nice place for a treat and a break in your day!

David, that's how you lead the way! Veterans need and like to work! Great job brosky. You, sir, are a rockstar! Civilians DO NOT! Understand how we operate! Well done, keep leading by example. Hopefully everyone will listen to you! Finally.
Some of the best coffee I've had anywhere.  The staff is super friendly as well.
Meh, another average coffee shop that tries to justify $5 for a latte. The interior is nice and cozy, plenty of space and seating but the coffee drinks I've had so far are meh.
Knowledge Perk is the only place I get coffee in the area. They roast THE best coffee!
so presh!
Delicious coffee and the spinach feta croissant was amazing
Good coffee. Better service. Just wish they had more baked goods.
Awesome coffee place! Great location, good view, calm and peaceful. Very polite staff and excellent customer service. Will be back for sure!
Great place with a cozy atmosphere

I love this coffee shop! I come here often to study. The staff is very nice and the drinks are tasty. It is decorated cutely and there are outlets in good positions. There is just one complaint I have.... It is so so cold in here. I have to bring a blanket and jacket to sit in here I still love it though
Nice people and some great coffee!
Incredible cup of coffee with an even better team! Thank you!

Great customer service from everyone I interacted with, was my first time here and he really helped me figure out what I want and was knowledgeable on all the products. I was hesitant on getting one of the empanadas but I went for it and it was actually delicious taste homemade. Coffee was 7/10 taste like blonde espresso and I'm not a huge fan of blonde but the flavors were good I will definitely be back!!!
First time there today. OMG! Wish I went there sooner. I ordered a Mocha iced coffee and spinach feta pinwheel...so amazingly great!! I will be back soon!
Wow!  This place is great. Great coffee and friendly service.

Not only is the environment delightful and the service e courteous and timely, but the coffees are truly crafted with intention. Wow. The Colombian and Ethiopians pour overs were pleasant and fulfilling. It can be hard to pull the flavor notes out of the beams when the shop is busy. But Knowledge Perk delivers success in each cup. Yum. I'll be back tomorrow.
You can taste the quality not only in the coffee but also the house made pastries. Just tried their new spinach, feta one and it was fantastic! Great space and baristas!

Wow!  GREAT coffee with very fresh beans that they roast themselves. They also have some very tasty treats to go with the coffee, including a gluten free chocolate torte that was out of this world. My husband has celiac,s and he has approved it too.
Great coffee and food!! Nice place to relax for a bit and hang out with family or friends to catch up.
My daughter and I enjoyed our orders. I had a pour-over coffee, and kudos to them for having heavy cream available.
Best place in the area.  Good coffee.  Good place to get some work done.

Amended review:
I've been coming here regularly since opening as it's in my backyard. I still love the coffee but the customer service has left the building. I used to be greeted, and given recommendations on flights, seasonal and other specials and now I'm lucky if I get acknowledged at the checkout. Not to mention it's winter yet I go inside and it's freezing. I'm not sure if the management has changed or what but does have me looking elsewhere to go for my afternoon meetings and coffee dates. Disappointed local.

Initial review:
Amazing location with great, friendly workers. I've been waiting for a place to work and hang out locally for a long time and I think I've found my spot. The bonus is the coffee experiences they offer throughout the week.
Delicious coffee, quick service when it's busy, and they call you by name with a smile! Great addition to the Fort Mill / Tega Cay Community!

I love this place. The atmosphere is warm and inviting. I got so much work done. The coffee is great and the kindness of the owner is unlike anything I've experienced in Charlotte. You won't be disappointed
Very nice servers. I liked my hot chocolate!
Delicious local coffee.
Locally owned and best coffee in town

It was a good ambiance. Our barista was helpful and knowledgeable Of menu items. Helped me make a decision on what coffee to order per my taste and likings. I found it slightly pricey. Next time I will be ordering their coffee flight. I also wish, if they were open late. I may not go to Starbucks then. Overall 3.95/5 stars.

This is my new favorite spot!! My two favorite right now is the hazelnut latte and the maple bourbon latte. The flavor is nice and subtle without overpowering the coffee flavor.  If you like overly sweet coffee drinks and burnt tasting coffee this place is not for you.

Moved to the area yesterday and mu coffee maker wasn't ready.  Found this GEM.  Everyone is so nice, incredibly helpful, and patient.  Helped me with something a little new and I loved it.  Perfect place for coffee meetings.  Pastries looked amazing as well!
Quick way to gain a customer is to be friendly.  Top notch service!
Coffee was fantastic and I loved the customer service!
Everything was amazing! The staff is always super nice and helpful! The breakfast empanadas are literally the best ever! Thank you!
Finally we found a place that offers all coffee (or at least the ones we like) as decaf! Super delicious drinks and cute place to come and hang out.
I didn't like the drink I ordered and the barista was so so nice and remade it for me. Great food as well! Will definitely be back
Great experience, pleasant spot and the staff were very accommodating. So many great coffees to choose from!
Great coffee, tea and baked goods at KP's second location in the Fort Mill/Tega Cay area. All this coupled with friendly and attentive staff, that provide a welcoming atmosphere.
Great coffee and breakfast food.

I got the summer flight and was blown away by how refreshing each option I had was. The blackberry lemonade cold brew was absolutely perfect, and the chocolate orange one tasted like my favorite chocolate candy. Couldn't have been better.

Nice place to meet for coffee or tea.
Manager gave our party free pastries to sample.
Very nice atmosphere, clearly planned and designed with care for a pleasant open/relaxed vibe. The coffee was okay.. planning to go back sometime and try some other simple drinks.
Interesting Coffee
I got a mocha with hemp milk and cinnamon, my daughter got an egg and sausage Empanada, and my mom got a latte. All absolutely delicious and the staff was very friendly and quick.
Very comfortable

I was so excited to check this place out. This is my second visit the first being to the rock hill location and am dissapointed honestly. The staff is great and very kind but I ordered a cappuccino at both locations and got a latte at best. Maybe half an inch of foam both times  and maybe the fort mill location is still training because the espresso was very bitter like it had sat too long before the milk and foam were added. Maybe this is just how they make cappuccinos or maybe both visits were just flukes but at $5 a pop plus tip I can't see myself going back.

Knowledge Perk is what Fort Mill needed. Locally owned and nothing is outsourced. Their original location is in Rock Hill - it is such a cool spot but I'm glad to have them right by me now! Give them a try, you won't be disappointed.
FINALLY!  A local coffee joint that has a great working environment and fantastic coffee!
Coffee is delicious, calm atmosphere, plenty of comfortable seating. Kids hot chocolate had perfect taste and temperature for the kids to immediately drink.
I love this place!!! So excited about the new location
